name: Rishu Kumar Sharma
title: UI/UX Designer
tagline: Crafting intuitive digital experiences for B2B and D2C products
summary: UI/UX Designer with 2+ years of experience in B2B and D2C products. Skilled in Figma, Framer, wireframes, prototypes, and responsive UI. Experienced in UX research, usability testing, and agile workflows. Led end-to-end design for Pointo's D2C battery platform and an e-rickshaw driver app with battery tracking and in-app purchases.
